about_the_game:
Enhance your presentations, stream recordings, workout clips, and video lessons with easy-to-read timers and countdowns. These timekeeping intros will help you keep your audience engaged and on their toes.

In this pack, you'll find:

  • 1 title
  • 19 intro videos
  • 9 stickers
detailed_description:
Enhance your presentations, stream recordings, workout clips, and video lessons with easy-to-read timers and countdowns. These timekeeping intros will help you keep your audience engaged and on their toes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10/11 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible dual-core processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Additional Notes: 1280 × 768 screen resolution, 32-bit color
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
